response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which has been meticulously crafted to meet your specific needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by us due to its unique features, quality, and the time invested in its development. Given its worth and the benefits it offers to you, I am extending this opportunity to acquire it at the same price. I believe this is an excellent investment for you, considering its value to you is estimated at $8,000. Let's make this deal happen and elevate your experience with our product. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
